table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.poll}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `date` int(11) default NULL, `description` text, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` varchar(11) default NULL, `image_zoom` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `display_time_type` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `display_time_start` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `display_time_end` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `multiple` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`lang`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.poll_entries}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `poll_id` int(5) default NULL, `answer_id` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `ip` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `poll_id` (`poll_id`), KEY `answer_id` (`answer_id`), KEY `date` (`date`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.poll_answers}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `position` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `poll_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `poll_value` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`lang`,`position`) );
